summary:
Add unique non-essential 1 handed combat style Vampire chef follower
to the game that level up with player from level 15 [HDT required].
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][size=3][size=4]Dara Vampire Chef Follower HDT 18+[/size]

Add unique non-essential 1 handed combat style Vampire chef follower
to the game that level up with player from level 15 [HDT required].

Name : Dara
Class : Vampire
weapon : Dara Knife
Body : -CBBE-
Armor : Bloody Chef
Extra : Carry Weight & Marriable

[b]Location : [/b]
[Whiterun Dragonsreach]

[b]Required :[/b]

Skyrim.esm
Update.esm (latest 1.9)
Dawnguard DLC

[b][u]> > Required for HDT < <[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by [b]xp32[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996]HDT Physics Extensions by [b]HydrogensaysHDT[/b][/url]

[b]Recommended : [/b]
The LOOT
http://loot.github.io/

[b]Installation : [/b]
NMM or copy to data folder
[b]Uninstall : [/b]
Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder

[b]Credit : [/b]
BETHESDA
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by [b]Caliente[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio by [b]Caliente[/b][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986]Mature skin texture and body for UNP CBBE ADEC by Maevan2[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49963]True Eyes by [b]JimtownIrish[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32329]Battle Hardened Body Mod Vanilla UNP UNPB UNPC CBBE ADEC by [b]Wast1980[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221]KS Hairdos - 400 by [b]Kalilies Shocky and Stealthic Khaos[/b][/url]
